abort.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to stop an activity because it would be difficult or dangerous to continue it
abort.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The rescue mission had to be aborted.
abort.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to deliberately end a pregnancy when the baby is still too young to live
abort.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: if a pregnant woman or animal aborts, the baby is born too early and is dead when it is born
abort.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: The disease causes pregnant animals to abort.
